name: OMG
description:
God is on vacation and found a replacement: You! 
Decide the fate of all sinners at their last judgement. 

PLEASE ALSO VOTE ON THIS PAGE

Controls:
W, S - Scroll through cards
A - Go to Hell
D - Go to Heaven

P- Pause / Unpause while ingame
Space - Fast forward when queue is empty
Hold Escape ingame to get back to the main menu.

All Assets have been made in 72 hours! Enjoy!
This game was originally made for the Dreamhack Jam 2017.
